DIVISION OF HOUSEHOLD ITEMS
(1) Household items intended for the fulfilment of the everyday needs of heirs who lived in the same household as the decedent but who are neither his or her descendant or spouse shall be left to such persons, following their request, and the value thereof shall be included in their portion.
(2) When the value of the items in question surpasses the value of the hereditary portion, the heirs who have been left the items shall pay the difference to the other heirs in money.
